remarks: Equivalence relation involving equality of dependent classes ` A ( x ) ` and ` B ( y ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
eqer.1 $e |- ( x = y -> A = B ) $.
eqer.2 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | A = B } $.
eqer $p |- R Er _V $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d x y $.
